name: Mirrored (EmInSpace)
description:
You are able to jump 10 times in the mirrored version of each level

This Game Was Made For The Weekly Game Jam.

The Theme Was: Mirror

The Game Was Inspired By Portal

This Game Was Created By EmInSpace With The Help Of Dingoe12 (He Made The Pick Up System)

the pick up system is buggy so i'm sorry for that
